title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Narrative-Based English Learning for Expert Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced English reading comprehension and communication skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can deliver English presentations using narrative structures (introduction-development-crisis-resolution) with over 80% accuracy
Utilize over 200 context-specific vocabulary items through domain-specific case-based storytelling activities
Achieve communication fluency scores of 3.0 or higher (on a 5-point scale) during peer feedback evaluations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
